item.title: Lobsters Top Stories: Friday, October 11, 2024 at 9:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. AAA gaming on Asahi Linux (88 points | 15 comments)
2. It's Not Easy Being Green: On the Energy Efficiency of Programming Languages (24 points | 14 comments)
3. Mozilla fixes Firefox zero-day actively exploited in attacks (70 points | 14 comments)

6. Thunderbird Android client is K-9 Mail reborn, and it’s in solid beta (26 points | 16 comments)
7. RFC 9635: Grant Negotiation and Authorization Protocol (GNAP) (19 points | 6 comments)
8. Why You Shouldn't Forget to Optimize the Data Layout (10 points | 1 comment)
9. HTML for People (10 points | 2 comments)
10. Idol, an IDL and binary encoding for zero-copy local IPC (1 points | no comments)
11. Programming is fun (1 points | no comments)
12. Akin's Laws of Spacecraft Design (7 points | no comments)
13. Designing A Fast Concurrent Hash Table (6 points | 2 comments)
14. Coding without braces: An alternate C Syntax (7 points | 10 comments)
15. First report on the Pre-Scheme Restoration (18 points | 1 comment)
16. Using Chrome's accessibility APIs to find security bugs (2 points | no comments)
17. Implementing Raft: Part 4 - Key/Value Database (3 points | no comments)
18. Why GOV.UK's Exit this Page component doesn't use the Escape key (54 points | 11 comments)
19. Announcing Deno 2 (73 points | 54 comments)
20. My negative views on Rust (2021) (52 points | 104 comments)
21. The Science of Functional Programming (3 points | no comments)
22. Computational Protein Design (4 points | 1 comment)
23. Running WolfSSL and cURL on Windows 2000 (4 points | no comments)
24. Rama on Clojure’s terms, and the magic of continuation-passing style (5 points | no comments)
25. Japanese Font Support (2 points | no comments)
